Check store stock overlay Please use this overlay to check for product availability [](javascript:;) Collect 105 Boots Advantage Card points with this purchase [ Product details ](javascript:void(0)) - Diffusion control. - Soft mood lighting control. - Water level indicator. - Compact size (100ml water capacity). - Perfect aroma mist - add essential oils to water to deliver a steady amount of fine fragranced mist to suit your mood. - 4-5 hours' continuous mist mode. - Automatic shut-down when diffuser runs out of water. - Ultra-quiet for maximum comfort, especially at night. - Use with Tisserand Aromatherapy pure essential oils or our pre-blended diffuser oil (Total De-Stress Diffuser Oil included). - 1 x Aroma Spa Diffuser, Power 12W - 1 x Total De-Stress Diffuser Oil - 9ml - Instruction booklet - Water measuring cup How to use To fill your home or workplace with a calming aroma, add 6 to 8 drops of Total De-Stress Diffuser Oil to your Aroma Spa Diffuser to help you relax whenever you need it most. Adjustable mist for your every need Touch the Mist button once for a short time until a green light comes on at intervals (30 seconds of diffusion followed by 30 seconds of pause before the cycle restarts). Press the Mist button a second time and the green light will turn red, indicating that the mist will be continuously diffused. When you press the Mist button a third time, the mist will stop being diffused and the light will turn off. It is possible to stop diffusion and lighting at any time by keeping the Mist button depressed. Adjustable lighting for your every need Press the Light button once for the first time and the light will gradually change colour. When you press the button a second time, the colour currently displayed will be continuous. Each subsequent press of the Light button will change the colour and intensify the lighting. To switch off the light, keep the Light button depressed for several seconds. Hazards and Cautions Total De-Stress Diffuser Oil Safety Information: For external use only. Avoid contact with eye area. Do not ingest. Do not use on any skin. The Aroma Spa Diffuser Safety Information: Only use tap water. Do not use distilled water. Do not use chemical fragrances. Use only 100% natural essential oils. Do not add more than 8 drops of essential oil to the appliance. Excess essential oil could damage the diffuser.
